game_description: ***LIMITED DISCOUNT // 45% OFF at LAUNCH*** Looking for a party game experience with only one headset on hand? We got you covered. There is no better feeling than earning money through hard work and perseveranceâ€¦ until you play Do U Copy? ! Do U Copy? is a VR co-op game for friends, family and couples who wants to put their communication skills to the test! In Do U Copy?, robbing a bank becomes a cooperative business. Play as the Thief and make your way through one of the (least) secured banks in the country. Avoid traps, guards and camera using your VR legs and the guidance of your Â« guy-in-the-chair Â». OR Play as the Hacker, become the eyes and ears of the operations through your phone, tablet or laptop! Using your (un)realistic skills, hack through the bank securities, guide your ally and solve engaging puzzles with unexpected turns! Do U Copy? requires a minimum of 2 players to be played. Get the Hacker App at https://www.fugamestudio.com
review_1: I love asymmetric VR games and this is one of the best I've played. If this is early access I cannot wait for the full release! Keep up the great work!
review_2: Everything is great except for one thing the hacker role on the Mobile app constantly kicks you out of the game and then you have to start the level you were all over again other than that though this is a really fun game to play with a friend or two.
review_3: The experience was really fun! Mechanics are really simple but I love this games were we don't need everyone to have a VR gear while still both sides have fun. It offers me something unique I didnt have and thats why Im giving It 5* Would love more of this and more mechanics being added! Also the mods on their discord are really fast and helpful, check It out!
review_4: 23h. Saturday. Last 4 survivors from this double birthday were sitting outside "on air". We are getting sleepy and bored. I am taking out my headset! Passing my phone to my friend with the phrase:" DO YOU COPY?" ðŸ˜‰, while putting the glasses. This was the best 2 h. co op game with 3 hackers and one robber!!!! I hope there will be support and updates. P.s. everyone who is wearing my Quest, has passed at least 1 "First steps "
review_5: I enjoyed playing with a friend but the interactions between thief and hacker become repetitive fast. The game is definitely worth it at the launch price but it feels clunky in several aspects. I hope to see this grow as the concept is great and usability issues can be fixed. Creating more â€˜puzzleâ€™ diversity requires more work, though.
